channel.title: Quick Color Question
channel.description:
How can I make it so every time when I start up my client, It says something. For example: @red@You are using the client.
How can I do it so it will be in red and say that every time someone logs in.
NOTE: I need it client side, not server side (ex: sendMessage:) So if another client signs into the same server it won't say that sentence to him, only my client will say it on every server I join. Thanks!
EDIT: Using Galkon's Refactored if that helps
